original_title: UFC on FX 7: Belfort vs. Bisping
overview: UFC on FX 7: Belfort vs. Bisping was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship on January 19, 2013, at Ginásio do Ibirapuera in São Paulo, Brazil. The main fight featured middleweights Michael Bisping and Vitor Belfort.
title: UFC on FX 7: Belfort vs. Bisping
